DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , 26-week , single-arm , open-label , safety study . Subjects remain study 26 week time kidney transplantation , whichever come first . All subject , addition receive cinacalcet , receive standard care , may include vitamin D sterol ( 25 OH vitamin D and/or 1-25 OH vitamin D analog ) . Subjects complete 26-week study may eligible participate extension study ( Study 20140159 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety & Tolerability Cinacalcet Pediatric Subjects With Chronic Kidney Disease & Secondary Hyperparathyroidism
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subjects age 28 day < 6 year age enrollment ( Czech Republic minimum age ≥2 year age enrollment ) Screening plasma iPTH level > 300 pg/mL ( 31.8 pmol/L ) central laboratory , receive cinacalcet therapy least 30 day prior start dose Screening correct calcium central ≥laboratory : 9.4 mg/dL ( 2.35 mmol/L ) age 28 day < 2 year 8.8 ( 2.2 mmol/L ) age ≥ 2 < 6 year Serum phosphorus central laboratory : 5.0 mg/dL ( 1.25 mmol/L ) age 28 day < 1 year 4.5 mg/dL ( 1.13 mmol/L ) age ≥ 1 < 6 year SHPT due vitamin D deficiency , per investigator assessment Dry weight ≥ 7 kg time screen Exclusion criterion : History congenital long QT syndrome , second third degree heart block , ventricular tachyarrhythmias condition associate prolonged QT interval Corrected QT interval ( QTc ) > 500 m , use Bazett 's formula QTc ≥450 ≤ 500 m , use Bazett 's formula , unless write permission enroll provide investigator consultation pediatric cardiologist Use grapefruit juice , herbal medication , potent CYP 3A4 inhibitor ( eg , erythromycin , clarithromycin , ketoconazole , itraconazole ) Use concomitant medication may prolong QTc interval ( eg , ondansetron , albuterol )
